summary: Rocket Companies - Mortgage platform with refi boom potential, trim 40-50% before earnings
action: Trim 40-50% before Feb 26 earnings, hold 50-60% for 5-year platform thesis
full_content:
## RKT Detailed Analysis (Updated Feb 13, 2026)

### Current Status
- **Entry:** ~$10 (timing not specified)
- **Current:** $18.68 (+87% gain)
- **Action:** Trim 40-50% before Feb 26 earnings
- **Hold:** 50-60% for 5-year platform thesis

### 5-Year Price Targets
| Scenario | Probability | Target | Annual Return |
|----------|-------------|--------|---------------|
| Bear | 25% | $12-16 | -4% to -8% |
| Realistic | 50% | $28-35 | +8% to +13% |
| Bull | 25% | $50-70 | +22% to +30% |

### Key Factors
- ✅ Trump Fed pressure (Warsh appointment likely)
- ✅ Potential refi boom 2026-2028
- ⚠️ Q-o-Q earnings still choppy (not META-style turnaround)
- ⚠️ At $18.68, paying 21x forward earnings (fair, not cheap)
- ❌ No clear moat yet (hoping platform thesis works)

### Trim Strategy
- **Sell 40-50%** at $18-19 = lock in $3.20-3.75/share profit
- **Hold remainder** with stop at $14 (below cost basis)
- **Reassess:** Post-Feb 26 earnings

### Next Catalyst
- **Feb 26, 2026:** Q4 2025 earnings
  - Watch: Production volume, servicing income, guidance
  - If EPS $0.25+ = trend turning, hold
  - If negative again = reconsider thesis
